name: Mistrider Daithi

skills.name: Briar Arrows
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of removing 1 random buff from the target. Also has a 10% chance of granting this Champion an Extra Turn.

effects.notes: Single-target ATK-scaling nuke. Damage Multiplier: 3.8 ATK. Books increase damage +20% total.
50% chance to remove 1 random buff (60% when booked). Buff strip component.
10% chance to grant Extra Turn on use. RNG turn cycling mechanic. Synergizes with Relentless set for turn spam.

skills.book_value: Medium priority. +20% damage, +10% buff strip chance (50% → 60%). Books improve reliability.
skills.notes: Turn cycling engine. Low Extra Turn chance but combos with Relentless set for multiple consecutive turns. Buff strip is conditional utility for Arena/FW.

skills.name: Squall of Shafts
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. Grants an Extra Turn if a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff is placed on all enemies by this skill.

effects.notes: AOE ATK-scaling damage. Damage Multiplier: 3.9 ATK. Books increase damage +20% total.
75% chance to place 60% Decrease DEF debuff for 2 turns (100% when booked with +25% chance). Critical debuff for team damage amplification.
Grants Extra Turn if Decrease DEF is placed on ALL enemies. Conditional turn cycling. Requires high ACC to land on all targets.

skills.book_value: HIGH PRIORITY. Cooldown unchanged at 4 turns, but +20% damage and +25% debuff chance (75% → 100%) massively improves reliability.
skills.notes: Core skill. Guaranteed Extra Turn if Decrease DEF lands on all enemies (when booked). Requires 250+ ACC for reliable placement. Pairs with A3 setup for 3-turn rotation (A3 → A2 → damage follow-up).

skills.name: Hunt the Mists
skills.description: Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff and a 50% [Increase ACC] buff on this Champion for 3 turns, then grants an Extra Turn.

effects.notes: 50% Increase ATK buff for 3 turns. Damage amplification for A2 → follow-up rotation.
50% Increase ACC buff for 3 turns. Ensures A2 Decrease DEF lands reliably. Reduces ACC stat requirements from gear.
Grants guaranteed Extra Turn after buffing. Setup skill for A3 → A2 → damage combo.

skills.book_value: HIGH PRIORITY. Cooldown reduction from 6 → 4 turns (-2 cooldown) dramatically improves uptime. Matches A2 cooldown for synchronized rotation.
skills.notes: Core setup skill. Guaranteed Extra Turn creates A3 → A2 combo (2 turns baseline). If A2 lands Decrease DEF on all enemies, grants 3rd turn for follow-up damage. Books reduce cooldown to 4 turns (matches A2), enabling synchronized rotation.

forms.aura: Increases Ally ACC in all Battles by 40
forms.comments: Form-specific notes, edge cases, or user/community feedback.

stat_priorities: ACC 250+ (debuff reliability, compensates for Inc ACC buff)

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: ATK%, C.RATE 100%, C.DMG, ACC 250+, SPD 171-191 (speed tune). Not optimal for CB (better options available), but usable for debuff role.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: ATK%, C.RATE 100%, C.DMG 200%+, ACC 250+, SPD 200+. Wave clear focus with AOE Decrease DEF. Relentless set recommended for turn spam.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: ATK%, C.RATE 100%, C.DMG, ACC 250+, SPD 200+. Nuke setup with AOE Decrease DEF. Stoneskin for defense.
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: ATK%, C.RATE 100%, C.DMG, ACC 250+, SPD 200+, HP%/DEF% for Hard waves. Relentless set for turn cycling on trash waves.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: ATK%, C.RATE 100%, C.DMG 200%+, ACC 250+, SPD 200+. PRIMARY USE CASE. Critical for Sylvan Watchers AOE Decrease DEF coverage. Relentless set breaks FW21.

recommended_gear: Relentless (PRIMARY RECOMMENDATION - turn spam synergy with Extra Turn mechanics, community reports 7-8 consecutive turns)
Savage (defense ignore stacking with Decrease DEF, high damage output)
Perception (ACC boost for debuff reliability, frees up other stats)

clan_boss: T6: Warmaster (Giant Slayer not recommended - low hit count)
Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Life Drinker, Bring it Down, Cycle of Violence, Methodical, Kill Streak, Warmaster
Defense: Defiant, Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death, Retribution

Defense: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution, Deterrence
arena: T6: Helmsmasher (nuker setup, ignore DEF stacking)
Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Whirlwind of Death, Ruthless Ambush, Cycle of Violence, Wrath of the Slain, Kill Streak, Helmsmasher
Defense: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution, Deterrence
doom_tower: T6: Warmaster (sustained damage for boss + waves)
Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Whirlwind of Death, Cycle of Violence, Wrath of the Slain, Kill Streak, Warmaster
Defense: Tough Skin, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution
faction_wars: T6: Warmaster or Helmsmasher (user preference - Warmaster for sustained, Helmsmasher for nuke)
Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Whirlwind of Death, Ruthless Ambush, Cycle of Violence, Wrath of the Slain, Kill Streak, Warmaster/Helmsmasher
Defense: Tough Skin, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution
general: Full Offense tree priority for damage scaling
Defense tree: Survivability picks (Tough Skin, Delay Death, Retribution for squishy Epic)
T6 choice: Warmaster (general PVE) vs Helmsmasher (nuker Arena/FW)

blessings: Cruelty (Clan Boss - extra damage on Warmaster procs)
Crushing Rend (Dungeons/FW - damage dealer primary blessing, scales with ATK)
Chainbreaker (Debuffer alternative - if using as dedicated Decrease DEF role)
Brimstone (Arena - chain attack potential with Extra Turn cycling)
Faultless Defense (if survivability issues in Hard content)

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI prioritizes A3 → A2 rotation correctly. No major AI issues reported. Auto-friendly for dungeons/FW.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: Turn Spam / Relentless Extra Turn Loop
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Relentless set + Extra Turn mechanics create turn spam loops. Community reports 7-8 consecutive turns in Faction Wars 21. Rotation: A3 (Inc ATK + Inc ACC + Extra Turn) → A2 (AOE Decrease DEF + Extra Turn if lands on all) → A1 spam with 10% Extra Turn chance. Relentless proc adds additional turns. Can solo carry FW waves with proper setup. Synergizes with Ronda for chaining. REQUIRES: 250+ ACC (to land Decrease DEF on all targets for A2 Extra Turn), 100% C.RATE, high C.DMG, books for A2/A3 cooldown sync (4 turns each).

mechanics_advisory: Turn cycling specialist with AOE Decrease DEF. Core mechanic: A3 → A2 rotation grants 2 guaranteed turns, potentially 3 if Decrease DEF lands on all enemies. A1 adds 10% Extra Turn chance for sustain. Relentless set amplifies turn spam dramatically (community confirms 7-8 turn chains). Best use case: Sylvan Watchers Faction Wars (critical AOE Decrease DEF for faction). Also strong in dungeons/DT for wave clear. Not meta for CB/Arena but functional. Requires books (10 total, A2+A3 only) for cooldown sync and debuff reliability. Needs protection (squishy Epic base stats). Counters: Buff heavy teams (A1 buff strip conditional), RNG dependent (Extra Turn procs, debuff placement). Synergies: Ronda (Sylvan Watchers FW), any Inc ATK/ACC champions, TM boosters to cycle faster.

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Stats manually provided by user via screenshot - 100% accurate. SPD corrected from OCR error (15 → 19). All other stats validated.

author: GitHub Copilot
comments: B-tier Epic nuker with turn cycling mechanics. Primary use case: Sylvan Watchers Faction Wars (AOE Decrease DEF critical for faction). Community feedback: 'Absolutely destroys FW 20-21', '7-8 consecutive turns in Relentless', 'significantly improved clear times in Ice Golem, Dragon, FK'. Relentless set is MANDATORY for full potential. Requires full books (10 total) for A2/A3 cooldown sync. Compared to Whisper (similar turn cycling kit). October 2022 release (Patch 6.20). Not meta for endgame CB/Arena but excels in niche (FW, dungeon wave clear).

update_notes.last_patch: Patch 6.20 (October 27, 2022) - Champion release with Sylvan Watchers faction
